means: （尤指英国国教宗教会议下院的）主席

sentence.Network_en: A great deal of prolocutor consumingly attacked this overture at the meeting.
sentence.Network_cn: 大会上许多的发言人强烈抨击了这项提案.

sentence.Network_en: The yearly coolest prolocutor belongs to nobody but the World Cup snot pig.

sentence.Network_en: In a one word letter, the prolocutor said: " The newborn will be born the next summer. "
sentence.Network_cn: 在一封只有一句话的声明中, 发言人这样说: “ 新生儿将于明年夏天诞生. ”

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... procurator 代理人 prolocutor 代言人 proto- == 原始.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in sense 2): from Latin, from prolocut- 'spoken out', from the verb proloqui, from pro- 'before' + loqui 'speak'

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"赞同,亲…"; 2. 也有"代替"之意; 3. 表示"向前,在前;预先"; 4. 表示"很多…"
